DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1 , multiple dose , open-label pharmacokinetic study conduct healthy adult male female subject . Subjects receive 3 oral dos WCK 4873 administer once-daily start Day 1 . Blood collection determine plasma WCK 4873 concentration conduct within 15 minute prior 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 6 , 9 , 12 , 24 hour first dose WCK 4873 . The 24 hour post-dose sample first dose collected prior Day 2 dosing . Blood sample determine plasma WCK 4873 concentration also collect within 15 minute prior 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 6 , 9 , 12 , 24 36 hour third dose . Each subject undergo one standardized bronchoscopy bronchoalveolar lavage ( BAL ) outpatient bronchoscopy suite 3 , 6 , 9 , 12 , 24 48 hour third oral dose WCK 4873 . Subjects schedule bronchoscopy 48 hour also blood sample drawn determine plasma WCK 4873 concentration 48 hour third dose . Safety assess throughout study adverse event monitoring , clinical laboratory test ( include liver function test ) , ECG , physical examination vital sign monitoring . Subjects discontinue study drug administration event AST/ALT elevation great 3 time upper limit normal .
DOC.brief_title: Study Determine Compare Plasma Intrapulmonary Concentrations WCK 4873 Healthy Adult Human Subjects
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 30 ( kg/m2 ) weight 55.0 100.0 kg ( inclusive ) . Medical history without major pathology judge Principal Investigator .
